metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8364 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The read_buf function in stream.c in rzip 2.1 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rzip - 2.1-2ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rzip package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-2ubuntu0.14.04.1').
